Texts.Eng:
Beetle-like omnivorous bipeds with tough chitin plates and a love for the exuberant.

^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;20^reset; Health, +^green;5^reset; Defense, Max Food x^green;1.5^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;15^reset;% Physical,+^cyan;10^reset;% Fire, Poison & Electric, +^cyan;5^reset;% Radioactive

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^green;Jungles, Deserts and Sulphuric^reset; biomes: Energy x^green;1.1^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Short Spear Mastery: +^green;25^reset;%
  Bow Mastery:  +^green;5^reset;%
  Shield: +^green;2^reset;% Shield Bash, +^green;2^reset; Shield Push distance
  Perfect Block restores ^green;health and ^green;20^reset;% shield stamina^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Poor traders (-^red;5^reset;% Charisma)
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;15^reset;% Ice, -^red;12^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;10^reset;% Shadow
